paper_abstract: An X-valued rough variable is introduced as a measurable function from a rough space to a measurable space X. Based on the concept of X-valued rough variables, some properties of X-valued rough variables are studied. Furthermore, the concept of chi-convergence is presented, and chi-convergence of X-valued rough variables is discussed. (c) 2007 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Rough variables with values in measurable spaces
